content.question: The decorative program and rituals associated with the Templo Mayor were created to emphasize to its audience which of the following ideas?

choices.label: The beauty of Mexica creation mythology and cosmology
The importance of Olmec influence on Mexica culture and history
The power of the Mexica Empire and of its patron deity
Mexica beliefs about the afterlife and how to navigate its trials

content.answer: The power of the Mexica Empire and of its patron deity

topic.text: 5.3: Purpose and Audience in Indigenous American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
